pile dripping pile is a Boston rock band
that formed around 2007 and they're
fronted by guitarist singer songwriter
Rick McGuire and this may be the first
time you're hearing of this band but
this is certainly not their first record
there are two full-length albums that

currently working with now it was much
more of an acoustic and folky edge to it
now at this point in Pyles progression

guitars based some acoustic guitars

more distorted beefier McGuire's
singer/songwriter biases are still there
in the focus on melody and storytelling
